petProjects.title: ERM System for VDG Solar
petProjects.description: Developed a custom ERM system for VDG Solar to manage electrical engineering operations. Features include Google Sheets integration, store management, cost calculation, and invoice generation. Initially a pet project, now under commercial development.
features: Database updates Google Sheets or Batch import

petProjects.title: TunerFest
petProjects.description: Developed TunerFest, a community website for The Crew MotorFest players in collaboration with Militia Gaming. Features PWA support, Sanity DB integration, fast search, and tuning tracking. From start it has more than 1000+ users. More than 32,000+ views. Median time on page 8:30 min. DB more than 5000+ records and unique pages. First load time 0.7 sec. GTmetrix A+. Seo text and image generation.

petProjects.title: Book Database Website
petProjects.description: Created a dynamic book database web application allowing users to add, edit, delete, and favorite books via server interaction. p.s. server can be down sometimes.

petProjects.description: Developed a functional demo of a banking web application enabling user login (demo credentials: js, 1111), fund transfers, and account sorting.

petProjects.title: Maply

petProjects.description: Developed a Chrome extension for automatic text transliteration between Latin and Cyrillic keyboard layouts.

petProjects.title: Dice Rolling Game
petProjects.description: Created a two-player dice game with turn-based mechanics, point accumulation, and a rule to reset score on rolling a 1.

petProjects.description: Designed and built Omnifood, a responsive landing page for a conceptual healthy food service, focusing on clean HTML/CSS implementation.

petProjects.description: Developed a portfolio site displaying high-accuracy (up to 5cm) 3D visualizations of solar panel installations integrated onto real photographs.
